actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Lands

official_title: To assist the State of New Hampshire in examining the historical significance of the Berlin, New Hampshire, area.
short_title: Berlin, New Hampshire Historic Recognition Act

summary.text: Berlin, New Hampshire Historic Recognition Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to assist the State of New Hampshire in examining the Berlin, New Hampshire, area and the Androscoggin Valley region for historical significance and identification of sites for possible listing on the National Register of Historic Places.

titles.title: Berlin, New Hampshire Historic Recognition Act
To assist the State of New Hampshire in examining the historical significance of the Berlin, New Hampshire, area.
